alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 1:23PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central San Diego County through 200 PM PDT... At 122 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Potrero, or 11 miles southwest of I-8 Between Pine Valley And Boulevard, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Morena, Potrero, Campo, Tecate, Dulzura, Barrett Lake, Otay Mountain and Jamul. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
